testcase.classname: Find your student accommodation in Unite Students accomodation
testcase.name: find_your_student_accomodation_in_Bath_001
testcase.system-out: Given The user search student accomodation in "Bath"........................passed When user click on "Charlton Court" view rooms..............................passed Then Validate "Charlton Court" is displayed to book a viewing...............passed When user select "Studio, Premium Range 1" to book..........................passed Then Validate checkout page displayed.......................................passed When the user enters new account details and continue.......................passed
